name: navs-aml
description: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) services powered by NAVS - Node-Assisted Verification Service

scripts.deploy: forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --broadcast --verify --etherscan-api-key $BASESCAN_API_KEY -vvvv && npm run generate-abi
